div.l: For att an hoole in schon þe mone bright
And bi þat light sche saw hem bothe twoo
But siker sche wiste not who was whoo
But as sche sawe a white thyng in here eye
And when sche gan þis white thyng espie
Sche went þe Clerk had wered a volupere
And wᵗith þe staff sche drowe ay nere ⁊and nere
And went to haue hitt þis Aleyn att þe full
And smote the Miller even on þe pilled scull
And doun̄ he goth // and cride harowe y die
Þise Clerkis bete hym well and lete hym lye
And arayed hem / and tooke her hors anon̄
And eke here mele / and on þer way þey goon̄
And att þe mylle dore yit þei toke here cake
Of half a busshel floure full wele y bake
Thus was þis proude Miller well y bete
And hath loste þe gryndyng of his whete
And paide for the sowper eủerydele
For Aleyn̄ ⁊and Iohn // þat bete hym wele
His wyfe was swyued ⁊and his doughter als
Loo suche it is a Miller for to be fals
And þerfor þis ꝓprouerbe is seide ful soth
He dare not wene well þat evill doth
A gilour schall hym silf begiled bee
And god þat sittith high in mageste
Save all þis Company grete and smale
Thus haue I quytte þe Miller his tale
The Cook of london̄ whils þe Reve spak
For ioy hym thowth he clawed hym on þe bak
A ha quod he For Cristes Passioıı̄un
This Miller hath a scharp̄e Conclusioıı̄un
Vpon his argument / of his herbergage
Well seide Salamon in his langage
Ne bryng not eủery man to þin hous
For herbergh be nyght is ꝑperilous
Well owth a man avised for to be
Whom þat he bringith to his pⁱriuyte
I pray to god so yefe me sorow ⁊and care
If euer sith y hete hogge of ware
Herde y a Miller better sett awerke
He had a iape of malice in þe derke
But god forbede þat we stynte here
And þerfor if ye vouche safe to here
A tale of me þat am a pouer man̄
I wol tel you as well as y can̄
A litle iape þat fell in oure Cite
Oure oost aunswerd ⁊and seid y gᵃraunt it the
Now tell on Rogger and loke þat it be good
For many a pastee hast þou leten blood
And many a Iak of douer hast þou solde
Þat hath been twies hoot ⁊and twies colde
Of many a pilgreme hast þow Cristes curs
